translations: n．煽动，挑唆：激起或诱使他人采取行动，尤指不道德或非法的行为。
· He was accused of instigations to violence.

sentences.sentence: This article is based on the formal instigations and documentary records of the early 20th century, and makes an evaluation of the living conditions of the peasants in the suburbs of Shanghai.
sentences.translation: 本文力图在前人研究的基础上，以20世纪上半期上海城市郊区农家生活状况的文献记载和实地调查为基础，对这一时期沪郊农家生活状况作出评估。
